Annotation.String: This is the schema definition for the CRAH Metrics.
This resource shall be used to represent a cooling metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.
Cooling properties can be updated to change limits, exceptions and other writable properties.
The actual Firmware Revision of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Rev of CRAH.
The actual Hardware Revision of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Rev of CRAH.
Date of manufacture of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual date of manufacture of CRAH.
The actual Manufacturer of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Manufacturer of CRAH.
The actual Model Number of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Model Number of CRAH.
The actual Serial Number of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Serial Number of CRAH.
The actual Part Number of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Part Number of CRAH.

The value of this property shall represent the actual Asset Tag of CRAH.
The actual Physical Location of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Physical Location of CRAH.
The actual Temperature Set Point of CRAH.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Start Count of CRAH.
